document_data.name: Othmeera Talask
document_data.mainbody: Lord '''Othmeera Talask''' was the ruler of [[Imdolphyn]] as of [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Activities:
Othmeera was the ruler of Imdolphyn in the late years of the 15th century [[DR]], and even if she was a woman, she styled herself as a "lord".{{Cite organized play/LFR/Quench the Fire of the Raging God|52}} As of 1479 DR, she had ambitions to overtake [[Tarmalune]]'s prominence amongst the [[Windrise Ports]].{{Cite dragon/376/Tarmalune and the Windrise Ports|48}}

Before rising to her position of ruler of Imdolphyn, Othmeera was a famous trader in textiles and scents. Although she retired from this life as she became the ruler of her city, many believed she was still practicing her trade as of 1479 DR.
